title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

title: Silver 27.5-inch Marin Bolinas Ridge 1 Mountain Bike
text:
Crisp condition 27.5" Marin Mountain Bike for sale (Offers are welcome)

NOTE: prioritizing in-person buyers

MODEL:
2021 Marin Bolinas Ridge 1 Hard Tail Aluminum 

SPECS:
- Series 1 6061 Aluminum frame
- 27.5" wheels
- 3x7-speed Shimano Groupset
- Power CX7 Mechanical Disc brake system 

OWNER REVIEW:
This pre-loved beauty is the perfect choice for entry level riders. The 27.5" Marin Bolinas Ridge 1 is great for both off-road and inner city rides, and is of comfortable size to anyone between 155cm (5'0") and 183cm (6'0") in height. Retailing at around R8000 at official bike stores, this is a deal you definitely do not want to miss out on!

OWNER DETAILS:
I bought this bike in July, 2022 as a way to keep healthy while I zoom through the Southern Suburbs, mostly traveling to work and to the gym. I am an amateur photography fanatic as well, and this bad boy has been an incredible companion on my trips to the coolest views around. I'm sadly forced to put it up for sale because I am taking driving lessons and will soon be using it much less than it deserves. 

EXTRAS:
- 1 Allen Key (Free)
- Original Packaging Box (Free)
- Black Helmet (+R70)
- Bicycle Computer (+R80)
- OG Locks U-Lock with 1 key (+R100)
- Adjustable Rear view mirror (+R100)

title: Huffy DS-3 26” Dual Suspension Mountain Bicycle
text:
DetailsConditionUsed - GoodMaterialSteelBicycle TypeMountain BikeBicycle Wheel Size26"Huffy DS-3 26” Dual Suspension Mountain Bicycle

I bought this bike new in November 2022 rode it for about 105 km 

Bike is in good condition tuned up, the gears shift like a dream, it’s been lubed up and ready to ride. In addition to the below features and specs there is also sealant in the tires, so you won’t get any flats with these tires.

This is a fun bike to ride, the hi-tensile steel suspension frame and dual suspension provides a great, responsive ride on any terrain. This bike is ideal for someone around 140 – 160 cm tall male and will also be great for a female.

Reason for selling: Grew out of the bike and got an upgraded 29” MTB.

FEATURES
• Hi-tensile steel suspension frame provides a great, responsive ride on any terrain
• Enzo 18-speed twist shift drive train with Shimano RD and linear pull brakes upgrade overall performance
• Kolo Performance 5200 suspension fork (by Huffy) provides a great ride with the right amount of response
• 3-piece crank adds durability and is designed exclusively by Huffy
• Alloy rims are lightweight and weather resistant to perform well in all conditions
• Premium saddle with bumper guards is durable and comfortable
• Alloy quick release seat binder
• Huffy branded Krayton grips
 
SPECIFICATIONS

Frame:  High tensile (Hi-ten) steel suspension
Fork: Kolo 5200 suspension
Shifting: 18-speed, twist
Derailleur: 6-speed Shimano (SiS) Index
Brakes: Steel linear pull
Crank: Steel, 3-piece
Seat: Premium padded with bumper guards
Tyres: 26 x 1.95 (66cm x 5cm) Knobby
Rims: Alloy Black
Net Weight: 16.16kg
Gender: Mens
Colour: Metallic Grey
Range: DS-3

title: Titan Drone Expert
text:
I am selling my 2018 Titan Drone Expert XC hardtail MTB. The bike is in good condition and has recently had a full service done by The Bike Rack, here is the list of what was fixed/replaced.
1. Strip and service of the headset bearings 
2. Rebuilt rear hub bearings 
3. Replaced the bottom bracket 
4. Replaced and bled the brake fluid in the front and rear brakes.
5. Cable frame protection 
6. Cable management 
7. Replaced the remote lockout cable for the suspension

Below are the specs of the bike.

Frame: DRONE X6 LIGHTWEIGHT ALLOY 29R QR FRAME. Frame Size: XL

Fork: SR SF14 XCR AIR 100MM (BRONZE Stantions) REMOTE LOCKOUT

Chainweel: SHIMANO M6000 DEORE 10-SPEED 36-26T

Rotors: OEM

title: Trek Fuel EX5
text:
Basic still brand new and in showroom condition. Only done 536 from new. 

The Fuel EX 5 is a full-suspension trail bike that's ready to handle it all. With trail-taming 140 mm front and 130 mm rear suspension, a Shimano 1x12 drivetrain, a dropper post for getting low on descents and hydraulic disc brakes, the Fuel EX 5 hits the mark as a high-value, high-performance mountain bike with exceptional versatility.

A sturdy aluminium frame with a Knock Block steerer stop to protect against spinning bars. A 140 mm RockShox Recon Silver fork, 130 mm of rear travel with an X-Fusion Pro 2 shock, a durable 12-speed Shimano Deore drivetrain, dropper post and hydraulic disc brakes.

title: BICYCLE RACK 4 CARRIER TOW BALL MTG
text: Contact: NINO on 060 327 5223 for further assistanceThis new platform bicycle carrier has at last arrived, the rack is presently available in a 2 & 4 bike configuration, great features are the roomy wheel supports that hug the bikes tyres that are kept secure with ratchet straps, but the greatest advantage that the new rack has over most other platform type racks is the distance between the bike runner positions. No more clashing of handlebars, seats etc. The inverted U support frame is a good size so supporting 29ers in the upright position is not a problem.Features:* Stable and convenient bike carrier for 50mm tow-bar/tow-ball mounting* NO Spanner required to mount or dismount the bike carrier* The bike carrier tilts back, giving trunk access without off-loading the bikes* Folds flat for easy storage* Lockable to tow-bar* Adjustable wheel holders with soft straps for accommodating most types of bikes* Suitable for carbon frame bikes with holder attached to the seat post* Vertical frame folds flat for easy storage, compact enough to be kept in the trunk of the car* Standard big round 7-pin power plug for the light board* Carries up to 4 bikes, 60kg load capacity* 1 Year factory warranty* CE certified* Original and patented design* Weight: 15kg* Dimensions: 110cm x 77cm x 18cmSKU: 14969

text: SPRINGBOK E-MTB HARDTAILRESERVE YOURS.DELIVERY DOOR-TO-DOOR BEFORE 25 DECEMBER 2022 TO ALL MAJOR CITIES* AND TOWNS*( *REMOTE AREA DELIVERIES: ADDITIONAL COURIER FEES MAY BE ADDED AT TIME OF DELIVERY)Consider Financing your Springbok with Yonda starting at R1089 per month.Model Name : SPRINGBOK (Hardtail e-mountain bike)Choose from 27.5" or 29" .Inspired by the Beauty, Strength and Agility of the SPRINGBOK.#1 The FrameMaterial : Alloy 6061Artwork: High quality enamel gloss with anti-rust treatment . Green and Black with White trims.Wheel / Fork type and size : 27.5" or 29"EU Frame safety standard-tested : EN15194.Available Sizes to choose from : Medium 17" , Large 19" , Extra large 21"#2 The MotorMotor is Protected inside the frame from outdoor elements - rain , mud ,direct sunlight and potential knocks from rocks or other objects during riding.Two protective alloy plates - one on either side of the frame/motor are removable for motor maintenance.Motor housing has Air flow holes on the underside of the frame ensuring an even flow of cool air during riding.Motor Plates further protect against salt spray & water splash - ideal for coastal regions.BBS and BBSHD motors are known to be notoriously quiet and torquey.Smooth Ride: Motors can be re-programmed from factory default settings to your own customizable parameters. This is one of the beauties of such a versatile ebike kit : the ability to Re-programme the settings to configures one's own personal preferences.Motor Fine-tuning : Riders own preferences for power, speed , pedal assist ( each of the 9 levels of PAS may be adjusted ) . Via a programming tool to suit each riders style and preferences.Motor swap : Swap out and upgrade or downsize motors as required and as your needs change.Choice of 3 Motors: Choose the motor for your SPRINGBOK that best suits you:A) Truck Run 250w Mid DriveTorque 70nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 25-28 km/h.If you are under 90 kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(B) Bafang BBS02B 500w Mid DriveTorque 85nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 32km/h.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences.If you are under 110kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(C) Bafang BBSHD 1000w M615 Mid drive.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences160nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS) . Average speed 45km/h.Freedom to ride at wider range of levels of power low ~ high.If you are under 160kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance even on the steepest of hills*

ADO 20F XE electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system - The latest XE model

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. title: Fuzion Cityglide Adult Kick Scooter (Green)
text:
Used Adult scooter. 

CityGlide by NextSport is the premier line of cruising BIG WHEEL Scooters. Great for last mile commuting and perfect for just getting out and having fun! This Scooter is your first choice of transportation on the go. Its lightweight and low-to-the-ground deck structure and oversized polyurethane tires provide a stable smooth ride even on bumpy city side walks. On top of that, the easy folding mechanism allows you to take Cityglide any and everywhere. CityGlide is suitable for ALL AGES but it is the ideal scooter for adults and teens due to its comfortable ride height. Great for college students! SUPPORTS RIDERS up to 220lbs!Foldable, and with big 200mm Wheels, you may not be grabbing big air anytime soon – but you’ll get where you need to be, fast.

The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3.
